nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify End of Service tab visibility state changes based on employee offboarding status
checks.selector_hint: End of Service tab in employee profile
checks.assertion: EOS tab should be visible for active employees and hidden/unavailable for offboarded employees

checks.description: Verify visual indication when EOS tab is disabled or unavailable
checks.selector_hint: End of Service tab disabled state indicator
checks.assertion: Disabled EOS tab should display greyed-out or disabled styling

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify gratuity file displays clear month identification and labeling
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity file download interface, month label field
checks.assertion: Month label should be clearly visible and unambiguous in gratuity file

checks.description: Verify gratuity data display is consistent between employee profile and downloaded file
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity values in employee profile and file download
checks.assertion: Gratuity values should match between profile view and downloaded file

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify hiring date field state when employee has payroll transaction history
checks.selector_hint: Hiring date input field in employee profile
checks.assertion: Hiring date field should indicate if it is editable or locked due to payroll history

checks.description: Verify error message displays when attempting to update hiring date with payroll history
checks.selector_hint: Error message near hiring date field
checks.assertion: Error message should explain why hiring date cannot be modified

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify available options for gratuity report generation
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity report download options, date range selector
checks.assertion: Report generation interface should display available date range and frequency options

checks.description: Verify if monthly gratuity report option exists
checks.selector_hint: Report frequency dropdown or toggle
checks.assertion: Monthly report option should be available or clearly marked as unavailable

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify Gratuity field availability in custom payroll report template
checks.selector_hint: Custom report template field selector, Gratuity field option
checks.assertion: Gratuity field should be available in custom report field dropdown

checks.description: Verify Gratuity field displays values or zero for employees without EOS
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity column in custom report output
checks.assertion: Gratuity field should show 0 for employees without completed EOS

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify accrual report month selection interface
checks.selector_hint: Month selector for accrual reports
checks.assertion: Month selector should indicate which months have available accrual reports

checks.description: Verify if historical accrual reports are available for closed months
checks.selector_hint: Accrual report download interface, month options
checks.assertion: Historical accrual reports should be accessible or clearly marked as unavailable

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify leave encashment daily wage calculation setting is visible
checks.selector_hint: Leave encashment calculation dropdown in EOS configuration
checks.assertion: Leave encashment calculation setting should display current selection

checks.description: Verify End of Service Eligibility section reflects calculation setting changes
checks.selector_hint: End of Service Eligibility section, daily wage display
checks.assertion: Eligibility section should update to reflect selected calculation method

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify pro-rated EOS amount displays with correct decimal precision
checks.selector_hint: Pro-rated amount field in EOS calculation
checks.assertion: Pro-rated amount should display with consistent decimal precision

checks.description: Verify daily wage formula configuration is visible in EOS
checks.selector_hint: Daily wage calculation formula display
checks.assertion: Formula should show configured calculation method (basic+allowances/30 or basic/30)

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify gratuity accrual report column headers are clear and descriptive
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity accrual report column headers
checks.assertion: Column headers should clearly distinguish between previous cycle and current cycle accrual

checks.description: Verify column definitions or tooltips explain accrual timing
checks.selector_hint: Column header tooltip or help text
checks.assertion: Tooltips should explain accrual calculation timing for each column

nav.canonical: Finance > Payroll table

checks.description: Verify tenure calculation is displayed in EOS
checks.selector_hint: Tenure field in End of Service section
checks.assertion: Tenure should display total service duration

checks.description: Verify unpaid leave deductions are visible in tenure breakdown
checks.selector_hint: Unpaid leave deduction in EOS calculation breakdown
checks.assertion: Unpaid leave days should be shown separately in calculation breakdown

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify final settlement amount breakdown shows all components
checks.selector_hint: Settlement amount breakdown section in EOS
checks.assertion: Breakdown should list gratuity, pro-rated salary, leave encashment, and expenses

checks.description: Verify previously processed payments are shown as deductions
checks.selector_hint: Previous payment deduction line item in settlement
checks.assertion: Previously paid amounts should be clearly shown as deductions from total

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify opening and closing balances display in gratuity accrual report
checks.selector_hint: Opening balance and closing balance columns in accrual report
checks.assertion: Opening and closing balances should be visible for each payroll cycle

checks.description: Verify new hire employees display correctly in accrual report
checks.selector_hint: New hire employee rows in gratuity accrual report
checks.assertion: New hire employees should not show negative accrual amounts

nav.canonical: Payroll Table > Menu > Download Gratuity File

checks.description: Verify gratuity amount is displayed in EOS calculation

checks.assertion: Gratuity amount should be visible and editable

checks.description: Verify calculation methodology is transparent or documented
checks.selector_hint: Calculation formula or help text near gratuity amount
checks.assertion: System should indicate calculation method used

checks.description: Verify gratuity report displays expected information fields

checks.description: Verify days of service field is present in gratuity report

checks.description: Verify transaction amounts are consistent across system views
checks.selector_hint: Transaction amount in payroll table and transaction page

checks.description: Verify gratuity description text is appropriate for employee country
checks.selector_hint: Gratuity description in EOS section
checks.assertion: Description should reference applicable labor law for employee's country

checks.description: Verify employee currency is maintained during EOS processing
checks.selector_hint: Currency field in EOS adjustment section
checks.assertion: Currency should remain consistent with employee's configured currency

checks.description: Verify total service duration is displayed in EOS
checks.selector_hint: Service duration field in End of Service
checks.assertion: Service duration should display years, months, and days

checks.assertion: Configuration option should allow including or excluding unpaid leave from tenure

checks.selector_hint: Finance menu, Payroll table link, employee selection, End of Service tab
checks.assertion: Navigation path should successfully reach End of Service section

checks.description: Verify departure date field is present and functional

checks.assertion: Departure date field should be visible and editable

checks.assertion: Dropdown should display available departure reason options

checks.description: Verify contract type selection options are available
checks.selector_hint: Contract type dropdown or radio buttons

checks.description: Verify calculate End of Service button is present
checks.selector_hint: Calculate or Compute button in EOS section
checks.assertion: Calculate button should be visible and functional

checks.description: Verify additions section is visible for review
checks.selector_hint: Additions section in EOS calculation
checks.assertion: Additions section should display available additions

checks.description: Verify deductions section allows adding/editing deductions

checks.assertion: Deductions section should allow one-off or recurring deductions

checks.description: Verify submit transaction button is present
checks.selector_hint: Submit or Process button in EOS
checks.assertion: Submit button should be visible and functional
